revised_title: Sydney John Folley: A Pioneering Scientist in the Field of Lactation and Endocrinology
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Sydney John Folley, a prominent scientist in the fields of lactation and endocrinology. Folley made significant contributions to the understanding of milk formation, hormonal control of mammary growth, and neuro-endocrine studies. His development of a herd of pedigreed goats at the National Institute for Research in Dairying played a crucial role in advancing research in these areas.
